meanings.definition: To make something individual to a particular person.
meanings.sent1: I will personalize this gift by adding your name to it.
meanings.sent2: She likes to personalize her belongings with stickers and colors.
meanings.sent3: Let's personalize this cake with your favorite cartoon character!
meanings.sent4: He personalized his workspace to feel like a cozy home.
meanings.sent5: The artist will personalize the portrait to capture your unique features.

meanings.definition: To tailor something to suit an individual's preferences or needs.
meanings.sent1: They will personalize the training program to fit your schedule.
meanings.sent2: The company offers to personalize the product according to your requirements.
meanings.sent3: I asked them to personalize my sandwich with extra pickles!
meanings.sent4: She personalized her workout routine to achieve her fitness goals.
meanings.sent5: The tailor will personalize the suit to ensure a perfect fit.
